name: Rabindranath Tagore
about: Rabindranath Tagore was a Bengali polymath who worked as a poet, writer, playwright, composer, philosopher, social reformer and painter.

name: Kazi Nazrul Islam
about: Kazi Nazrul Islam was a Bengali poet, writer, musician, and is the national poet of Bangladesh. Nazrul is regarded as one of the greatest poets in Bengali literature.

name: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
about: Sir Arthur Ignatius Conan Doyle KStJ DL was a British writer and physician. He created the character Sherlock Holmes in 1887 for A Study in Scarlet.

name: William Shakespear
about: William Shakespeare was an English playwright, poet and actor. He is widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language and the world's greatest dramatist.

name: Sharat Chandra Chattopadhyay
about: Sarat Chandra Chattopadhyay, alternatively spelt as Sarat Chandra Chatterjee was a Bengali novelist and short story writer of the early 20th century.

name: Allama Iqbal
about: Sir Muhammad Iqbal Kt, was a South Asian Muslim writer, philosopher, and politician, whose poetry in the Urdu language is considered among the greatest of the twentieth century.
